title: Nmap
content:
Basic Usage
-sP — nmap -sP 192.168.31.0/24
Version Detection
-sV — nmap 192.168.31.80 -p 80 -sV
Operating System Detection
-O — nmap 192.168.31.80 -p 80 -O
Output Format
-oN — Standard output
-oX — XML output
Port Specification

-p 80
-p 1-80
-p 80,3389,22,21
-p 1-65535
-p-
Scan Techniques

-sT — TCP Connect scan
-sS — SYN stealth scan
-sF — FIN scan
-sN — Null scan
-sX — Xmas scan
